attributes.title: BAD APP!
attributes.review: Constant texts and emails from it. It also stole my guinea pigs uncle and threw him off a bus and then made me pay for the food bill. No sir. I do not want it.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is the most disgusting app I have ever seen. Full of promotions for a small handed, orange megalomaniac! No one that is sane should bother with this app. It is a waste of time!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: This is the WORST app I’ve ever used. I opened the app and a Cheeto popped up A CHEETO I could not believe my eyes I was so disappointed the app is slow, and glitches repeatedly.

attributes.title: Oh noooooo🥰✨
attributes.review: Ok so first when I opened the app I was so superseded that I saw an orange sitting down talking to everybody and also he was all over news.

attributes.title: caused blindness!!!!
attributes.review: this app caused me to go BLIND!!! as soon as i opened the app, an overweight, greasy, orange man appeared on my screen and left me paralyzed with fear. the event was traumatic and i’m not sure if i will ever fully recover. 😔💔

attributes.title: A horrible app for a horrible president, which is exactly what I expected.
attributes.review: A horrible app for a horrible president, which is exactly what I expected.
When I got this app I saw our president and puked my dream turned into nightmares quick 🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️ after seeing his orange face i say trump 2020 but on a grave stone than a flag 🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼✨✨✨

attributes.title: Waste of my time
attributes.review: Absolutely AWFUL app that spammed my phone, increased my depression, and is making me question the world. Do not trust this man! He is ✨🧚🏻‍♀️terrible🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!! Don’t get it
attributes.review: It’s a horrible slow and annoying and for some reason is pro for trump 🤧😡disgusting

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: Absolutely disgusting. Crashed my phone and started a fire which burned my house down.
